Package mkr.ant.types.selectors

Class Summary
AndSelector<P> This selector has a collection of other selectors, all of which have to select a file in order for this selector to select it.
ContainsRegexpSelector<P> Selector that filters files based on a regular expression.
ContainsSelector<P> Selector that filters files/resources based on whether they contain a particular string.
DateSelector<P> Selector that chooses files based on their last modified date.
DependSelector<P> Selector that filters files based on whether they are newer than a matching file in another directory tree.
DepthSelector<P> Selector that filters files based on the how deep in the directory tree they are.
DifferentSelector<P> This selector selects files against a mapped set of target files, selecting all those files which are different.
ExtendSelector<P> Selector that selects files by forwarding the request on to other classes.
FilenameSelector<P> Selector that filters files based on the filename.
MajoritySelector<P> This selector is here just to shake up your thinking a bit.
NoneSelector<P> This selector has a collection of other selectors.
NotSelector<P> This selector has one other selectors whose meaning it inverts.
OrSelector<P> This selector has a collection of other selectors, any of which have to select a file in order for this selector to select it.
PresentSelector<P> Selector that filters files based on whether they appear in another directory tree.
SelectSelector<P> This selector just holds one other selector and forwards all requests to it.
SizeSelector<P> Selector that filters files based on their size.
TypeSelector<P> Selector that selects a certain kind of file: directory or regular.
